feed.title: Shayori Bose
feed.subtitle: As a high school junior passionate about scientific innovation, I aspire to become an oncologist advancing cancer care through AI-driven research, wet-lab experimentation, and clinical translation. I aim to bridge computational discovery and hands-on science to develop data-informed, clinically relevant solutions that transform oncology and improve patient outcomes.
